project.Title: Darkest Dungeon Clarity Mod
project.ItemDescription:
You no longer need to look at the Wiki for damn near everything!!!
Key Features: - More Quirk Information! Ever wanted to know what exactly Egomania does? You do now! - More Curio Information! Now you can have your Blight resistant hero open Curios that cause Blight! - More Information on Enemy Attacks! If they deal Damage, Require specific Ranks, or Target specific Ranks now you know! - Clearer Items! Along with a Curio interaction list by area. No need to think "What does antitoxin do in the Cove?" - Tips on quests based on areas. Going to the Cove? Grab some extra Shovels! - Boss Previews before starting a quest! No more "Uh-Oh! His stun resistance is actually pretty high!"
And more!
Still in development, so far only partially covers the crimson courtyard content, but more support coming soon!
